ack.p: The authors are grateful for financial support provided by MCTIC-CNPq/MEC-CAPES/MS-Decit/FNDCT N° 14/2016–Prevenção e Combate ao vírus Zika—Processo CNPq: 440350/2016-6 e Processo CAPES: 88881.130834/2016-01. The authors thank the São Paulo State Research Foundation (FAPESP) for scholarships awarded to EC (#2017/24402-1), DA (#2018/14743-0), and CR (2018/02404-5).
